ComicInfo.Title: Graveyard Monsters!; His Brother's Keeper; Glacier Beast; Dirt of Death!; Shangrila!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Simon Lorens kills his enemies and uses their various body parts to build a Frankenstein-like monster, but the corpses of his enemies re-animate to take their revenge.
Upon the death of their father, Vincent traps Lennie in a coffin and lets him die so Vincent can get all the inheritance. Lennie comes back from the dead and kills Vincent in the same manner and puts his coffin in the quicksand in the swamp.
Marie, her father, and two gangsters climb a mountain in search of a golden idol.
Lars hides the body of his victim Gargan around his lawn. At night the grass grows long and kills Lars in his sleep.
